flawed_nl_solution:
Ryan used 36/3 = <<36/3=12>>12 tokens on Pac-Man.
Ryan used 36/4 = <<36/4=9>>9 tokens on Candy Crush.
Ryan used a total of 12+9+7 = <<12+9+7=26>>26 tokens on all three games.
Ryan had 36-26 = <<36-26=10>>10 tokens left.
Ryan's parents bought him 2*7 = <<2*7=14>>14 more tokens.
Ryan had 10+14 = <<10+14=24>>24 tokens after his parents bought him some.
#### 24

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 28, not 26. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
